p: The bacteria such as, Staphylococcus aureus, E. coli, Enterobacter sp. , Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Bacillus subtilis and Proteus mirabilis were used . The selected bacterial strains were sub cultured on nutrient agar slants and maintained at 4 °C. These bacteria were further cultured in nutrient broth for 18 h prior to antibacterial assay.
